title: Better Margins In Cannabis
author: Seeking Alpha
dc:creator: Seeking Alpha
description: Jason Wild, who started out as a pharmacist, is President of JW Asset Management and Executive Chairman of US multi-state operator TerrAscend (TRSSF). He joins us to discuss starting his successful investing journey by reading Peter Lynch and by being disciplined about holding his winners and selling his losers relatively quickly. Following Trulieve's example of going deep but not wide. More focused, more scale in less places means better margins over near and long-term. Don't be too focused on federal legalization - you can't make money betting on what's going to happen in Washington. Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
